history.proof: intros l xs ys H. induction H. - srun best use: app_nil_l, IR_equivalent_refl. - constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent. sfirstorder depth: 3. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := l1 ++ l); auto. + srun best use: IR_equiv_app_head, IR_equivalent_refl. + sauto lq: on.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable l2.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := ys ++ l); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference ys was not found in the current environment.

original: intros l xs ys H. induction H. - constructor. - constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := ys ++ l); auto.
